summary.para: The TCP_TABLE_CLASS enumeration defines the set of values used to indicate the type of table returned by calls to .

remarks.para: On the Microsoft Windows Software Development Kit (SDK) released for Windows Vista and later, the organization of header files has changed and the TCP_TABLE_CLASS enumeration is defined in the Iprtrmib.h header file, not in the Iphlpapi.h header file. Note that the Iprtrmib.h header file is automatically included in Iphlpapi.h header file. The Iprtrmib.h header files should never be used directly.

summary.para: A table that contains all listening (receiving only) TCP endpoints on the local computer is returned to the caller.
A table that contains all connected TCP endpoints on the local computer is returned to the caller.
A table that contains all TCP endpoints on the local computer is returned to the caller.
A or that contains all listening (receiving only) TCP endpoints on the local computer is returned to the caller.
A or that structure that contains all connected TCP endpoints on the local computer is returned to the caller.
A or structure that contains all TCP endpoints on the local computer is returned to the caller.
A or structure that contains all listening (receiving only) TCP endpoints on the local computer is returned to the caller.
A or structure that contains all connected TCP endpoints on the local computer is returned to the caller.
A or structure that contains all TCP endpoints on the local computer is returned to the caller.
